deck.name: Various Spanish Sentences
deck.description: A collection of common Spanish vocabulary words with contextually appropriate sentences

cards.englishTranslation: What did you think of Mexico?
I need to memorize this information.

cards.sentenceFront: Ella está muy ___ con el trabajo.
cards.sentenceBack: Ella está muy **ocupada** con el trabajo.
cards.englishTranslation: She is very busy with work.
I like to chat with my friends.
I get surprised when I see that.
Can you explain how it works?

cards.sentenceFront: El ___ del círculo es de 10 cm.
cards.sentenceBack: El **diámetro** del círculo es de 10 cm.
cards.englishTranslation: The diameter of the circle is 10 cm.
I have several things to do.
I'm going to the market to buy fruits.
I want to go out this weekend.
There are a lot of people here.

cards.sentenceBack: Me gustan los tostones de **plátano macho**.

cards.englishTranslation: The soup has peas and carrots.

cards.sentenceFront: Hay ___ de comida en el buffet.
cards.sentenceBack: Hay **todo tipo** de comida en el buffet.
cards.englishTranslation: There are all kinds of food at the buffet.
Do you want to share your food with me?
I arrived early to the meeting.
I looked at myself in the mirror.
Is the computer on or off?
In summer we go to the beach.

cards.sentenceFront: La ___ es buena para las plantas.
cards.sentenceBack: La **lluvia** es buena para las plantas.

cards.sentenceFront: El ___ de maíz es importante aquí.
cards.sentenceBack: El **cultivo** de maíz es importante aquí.

cards.englishTranslation: I feel inspired by your story.
Do you want to eat something?
We're going to camp in the mountains.
We need to take out the trash.
I'm going to the bank to deposit money.

cards.sentenceFront: Necesito una ___ nueva para el invierno.
cards.sentenceBack: Necesito una **bota** nueva para el invierno.
cards.englishTranslation: I need a new boot for winter.
We went by boat on the lake.

cards.sentenceFront: Perdí mi ___ con todo mi dinero.
cards.sentenceBack: Perdí mi **cartera** con todo mi dinero.
cards.englishTranslation: I lost my wallet with all my money.
I have an appointment with the doctor.

cards.sentenceFront: El ejercicio es bueno para el ___.
cards.sentenceBack: El ejercicio es bueno para el **cuerpo**.
cards.englishTranslation: Exercise is good for the body.

cards.sentenceFront: Me gusta el ___ de esta casa.
cards.sentenceBack: Me gusta el **diseño** de esta casa.
cards.englishTranslation: I like the design of this house.
We're going to start the project tomorrow.
I live in a small city.

cards.sentenceFront: Mi ___ y yo vamos al cine.
cards.sentenceBack: Mi **pareja** y yo vamos al cine.
cards.englishTranslation: My partner and I are going to the movies.
There's a lot of dust on the furniture.
I'm working on an important project.
I want a hot dog with sausage.
I saw a snake in the garden.
The shark is a dangerous animal.
She has a very beautiful voice.
What dressing do you want for the salad?
I don't want to risk my money.
I practice martial arts on Tuesdays.
The ship arrived at the port.

cards.sentenceFront: Me gustan las ___ de este artista.
cards.sentenceBack: Me gustan las **canciones** de este artista.

cards.sentenceFront: Siempre uso ___ cuando ando en bici.
cards.sentenceBack: Siempre uso **casco** cuando ando en bici.
cards.englishTranslation: I always wear a helmet when I ride a bike.

cards.sentenceFront: El niño recibió un ___ por portarse mal.
cards.sentenceBack: El niño recibió un **castigo** por portarse mal.
cards.englishTranslation: The child received a punishment for misbehaving.

cards.sentenceFront: Necesito una ___ para ir a pescar.
cards.sentenceBack: Necesito una **caña de pescar** para ir a pescar.
cards.englishTranslation: I need a fishing rod to go fishing.
I go to the club on Fridays.
The chef prepared a delicious meal.

cards.sentenceFront: Mi ___ de trabajo es muy simpático.
cards.sentenceBack: Mi **compañero** de trabajo es muy simpático.

cards.englishTranslation: How long have you been studying Spanish?
There are good discounts at this store.
A disadvantage is that it costs a lot.
I'm very excited about the trip.
I like your style of dressing.
The air is very fresh today.
I want a gordita with pork rinds.

cards.sentenceFront: Los ___ son importantes para el cuerpo.
cards.sentenceBack: Los **huesos** son importantes para el cuerpo.
cards.englishTranslation: Bones are important for the body.

cards.sentenceFront: Tengo el ___ de leer antes de dormir.
cards.sentenceBack: Tengo el **hábito** de leer antes de dormir.
cards.englishTranslation: I have the habit of reading before bed.
My intention was to help you.
We're going to do it together.
Did you cry when you saw the movie?
The sea is very calm today.

cards.sentenceFront: Me voy a ___ en el barco.
cards.sentenceBack: Me voy a **marear** en el barco.
cards.englishTranslation: I'm going to get seasick on the boat.
My goal is to learn Spanish.
My stepfather is a very good person.
There was a fight in the street.
We're going to swim in the pool.
Put the milk in the refrigerator.
My husband tends to snore a lot.
They drew blood at the hospital.
I saved the leftovers for tomorrow.
Last night I dreamed about you.
The fish are in the tank.

cards.sentenceFront: El ___ de la clase es interesante.
cards.sentenceBack: El **tema** de la clase es interesante.
cards.englishTranslation: The topic of the class is interesting.
I have a lot of work today.
There are many advantages of living here.
I use the treadmill every day.
I don't have money to buy that.

cards.sentenceFront: Ella es una ___, sabe de todo.
cards.sentenceBack: Ella es una **todóloga**, sabe de todo.
cards.englishTranslation: She's a know-it-all, she knows everything.
We need to make the most of our time.
I had a very strange dream.
We're going to swim in the pool.

cards.sentenceFront: Me di un ___ en la cabeza.
cards.sentenceBack: Me di un **golpe** en la cabeza.

cards.englishTranslation: I don't want to risk my job.
I saw a shark at the aquarium.
The atmosphere here is very pleasant.
I don't want to miss the train.
Health is the most important thing.
She has a lot of talent.
I had a nightmare last night.

cards.sentenceFront: El helado de ___ es mi favorito.
cards.sentenceBack: El helado de **vainilla** es mi favorito.
cards.englishTranslation: Vanilla ice cream is my favorite.
We need to turn off the lights.
My grandparents passed away years ago.
The fish are in the fish tank.
We went to the aquarium on Sunday.

cards.sentenceFront: Él es un ___, sabe de todo.
cards.sentenceBack: Él es un **todólogo**, sabe de todo.
cards.englishTranslation: He's a know-it-all, he knows everything.
I started to shiver from the cold.
There was an earthquake last night.

cards.sentenceFront: Después de la lluvia vi un ___.
cards.sentenceBack: Después de la lluvia vi un **arcoíris**.
cards.englishTranslation: After the rain I saw a rainbow.
We have to follow the rules.
I'm going to take a shower.
We need to turn on the light.
